system.description: You know the mage hand cantrip, and when you cast it the hand is invisible, replaced by a faintly glowing wind. You can use this trait once between long rests to cast one spell, chosen from air wave, feather fall, or floating disk. Once you reach 3rd level, you can do so twice between long rests. Your spellcasting ability for these is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.
